IX.ii.1.B.1.c
.
Identification of Qualified State Veterans Home Facilities and VA Nursing Home Care Units
Regional offices should maintain a current list of
State Veterans home facilities approved for the nursing home care per diem rate, and
VA nursing home care units.
Note
:Â  The medical administration activity at VA medical centers (VAMCs) provides these lists.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Aid and Attendance (A&A) Status for Beneficiaries Who Are Patients in a Qualified Nursing Home
citation: Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
